response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted and tailored to meet your specific needs, valued at an incredible $800,000 by you. We understand its significance and would like to extend to you an exclusive opportunity to own it at a special price. Our offer to you is $750,000. We believe this price reflects the value you see in the product while allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 750000}
